entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with snow late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the evening then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
